name: Puzzle Picker
description:
In order to make a quick buck, you decide to make simple puzzle games. But you don't want to hire any designers, so you get a monkey to make the puzzles.

Quickly determine whether the puzzles created by the monkey are 'solvable' or 'unsolvable', by swiping them right or left. There are three stages with slider puzzles to rack up as many points as you can. This is a mouse only game.

This has been submitted to the 2018 GMTK Game Jam, genre without mechanic. This game is a puzzle game where you can't actually perform any moves to solve the puzzle.
